articles.title: Creator of Tsuta, the world's first Michelin-starred ramen shop, dies at 43 - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Yuki Onishi was the founder and head chef at Tsuta ramen, which has three outlets in Singapore.
articles.content:
Yuki Onishi, founder and head chef of the world's first Michelin-starred ramen restaurant Tsuta, has died. He was 43.
Tsuta Global announced the news on Friday (Sep 23), saying it was "deeply sadden… [+355 chars]

articles.title: Felicia Chin and Jeffrey Xu to marry in October - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The couple have been dating since 2015 and got engaged in a surprise proposal event earlier this year.
articles.content:
Felicia Chin and Jeffrey Xu are set to marry in October, the latter's agency said on Sunday (Sep 25).

articles.title: How can diabetes during pregnancy be prevented? - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Even if you're overweight and have a history of gestational diabetes in the family, making healthier choices such as eating a good diet can help.
